title: From where did Metallica write down breathtaking lyrics in their album Kill 'Em All, Ride the Lightning and Master of Puppets? Is there any source where they copied from? Did they themselves pen down their own lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Come on man, do you think that if such a big shot band copied someone lyrics and made hell lot of money the source (person or band) they copied it from would let it go? To the court, my dear friends. Coming back to the main topic. Yes they pen down their own lyrics :).

James Hetfield is one more most coolest guys in music world. He is the primary force behind most of the band's lyrics and many of the songs come from his personal battles. To know more about stories behind their songs and lyrics read this book
